collectors.titleDetails: (16 total Queries, 16 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: UPDATE `applications` SET `app_code` = '123456', `app_name` = 'app01', `description` = 'test app', `app_category` = 'inventory', `app_type` = 'Web', `business_purpose` = 'to track and manage assets', `department_id` = '9', `owner_name` = 'test user', `business_criticality` = 'Low', `lifecycle_stage` = 'Development', `eol_date` = '2026-03-14', `replacement_system` = 'example', `upgrade_roadmap` = 'example', `last_major_upgrade` = '2026-02-12', `repository_url` = 'https://example.com', `production_url` = 'https://example.com', `version` = '1.0.0', `status_id` = '1', `data_classification` = 'Public', `personal_data_flag` = 0, `authentication_type` = 'Internal', `encryption_enabled` = 0, `last_security_review` = '2026-02-12', `availability_sla` = '99%', `business_impact` = 'example', `peak_users` = '1', `monitoring_tool` = 'example', `annual_cost` = '1000.00', `license_type` = 'example', `license_expiry` = '2026-03-14', `vendor_contract_ref` = 'example', `cloud_subscription_details` = 'example', `last_updated` = '2026-02-12' WHERE `applications`.`id` IN ('3')
